PB HMI: Jangan Gaduh, Penunjukkan Kabareskrim Hak Prerogatif Kapolri
05 Nov 2019, 15:09 by Bunaiya Fauzi Arubone


PB HMI: Jangan Gaduh, Penunjukkan Kabareskrim Hak Prerogatif Kapolri

KBRN, Jakarta : Semua pihak diminta untuk menghormati keputusan dari Kapolri, Jenderal Polisi Idham Azis dalam memilih sosok dari penggantinya sebagai Kabareskrim Mabes Polri.Bendahara Umum Pengurus Besar Himpunan Mahasiswa Islam (PB HMI), Robi Syahrir mengaku sadar betul bahwa posisi Kabareskrim di Polri merupakan hal yang sangat vital dan merupakan hak prerogatif dari Kapolri."Oleh karenanya kami meminta dan menghimbau kepada semua pihak agar tidak terlalu gaduh dalam berspekulasi dan berjibaku membuat framming media terkait posisi Kabareskrim tersebut," katanya kepada wartawan di Jakarta, Selasa (5/11/2019).Lebih lanjut Robi mengaku sangat yakin bahwa Kapolri Idham Azis sangat mampu melakukan analisis sumber daya dan menilai kebutuhan organisasi untuk memilih Kabareskrim."Oleh karenanya, siapapun yang ditunjuk oleh Kapolri untuk menjabat posisi Kabareskrim nanti adalah orang yang tepat dan profesional serta merupakan perwira tinggi terbaik dan yang dimiliki Korps Bhayangkara," imbuhnya."Jangan gaduh, penunjukkan Kabareskrim hak prerogatif Kapolri," lanjutnya.Tak lupa, Robi pun mengajak semua pihak untuk "bergandengan tangan" bersama aparat penegak hukum untuk turut serta menegakkan supremasi hukum."Demi mewujudkan cita Negara Kesatuan Republik Indonesia yang berkeadilan," tukasnya. (Foto : Antara/ Wahyu Putro A)

PB HMI: Don't Be Gaduh, Appoint the Police Chief of Prerogative Rights of the National Police
05 Nov 2019, 15:09 by Bunaiya Fauzi Arubone


PB HMI: Don't Be Gaduh, Appoint the Police Chief of Prerogative Rights of the National Police

KBRN, Jakarta: All parties are asked to respect the decision of the National Police Chief, Police General Idham Azis in choosing a figure from his successor as the Police Headquarters Kabareskrim. "This is a very vital and prerogative right of the National Police Chief." Therefore, we ask and urge all parties not to be too rowdy in speculating and struggling to make media framming related to the Kabareskrim position, "he told reporters in Jakarta on Tuesday (11/5) 2019). Furthermore Robi claimed to be very confident that the National Police Chief Idham Azis was very capable of analyzing resources and assessing the needs of organizations to elect Kabareskrim. "Therefore, anyone appointed by the National Police to hold the Kabareskrim position would be the right and professional person and an officer "the best height and the Bhayangkara Corps," he added "Do not be noisy, the appointment of Kabareskrim the prerogative of the National Police," he continued. Not forgetting, Robi also invited all parties to "join hands" with law enforcement officials to participate in upholding the rule of law. "For the sake of realizing the ideals of the Unitary Republic of Indonesia with justice, "he said. (Photo: Antara / Wahyu Putro A)
